name: Terri
tagline: Centers on a large 15-year-old boy in a small town as he struggles to adjust to his difficult life.

name: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker
tagline: After the death of his uncle, the 14-year-old schoolboy Alex Rider is forced by the Special OperationsDivision of Britain's secret intelligence service, MI6, for a mission which will save millions of lives.

name: Parkland
tagline: A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.

name: Laaga Chunari Mein Daag: Journey of a Woman
tagline: A woman sacrifices her own happiness and reputation to financially support her family by working as a call girl.

name: Lassie
tagline: A family in financial crisis is forced to sell Lassie, their beloved dog. Hundreds of miles away from her true family, Lassie escapes and sets out on a journey home.

name: L'enfant
tagline: Bruno and Sonia, a young couple living off her benefit and the thefts committed by his gang, have a new source of money: their newborn son.

name: The Big One
tagline: On his book tour, Michael Moore exposes more wrongdoing by greedy big businesses and callous politicians around America.

name: Life of Brian
tagline: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

name: Saraband
tagline: Marianne, some thirty years after divorcing Johan, decides to visit her ex-husband at his summer home. She arrives in the middle of a family drama between Johan's son from another marriage and his granddaughter.

name: Dust to Glory
tagline: A documentary on the Baja 1000, an annual off-road race held in Baja, Mexico that attracts hundreds of racers, their souped-up machines, and thousands of fans.

name: Journey from the Fall
tagline: Thirteen years after the end of the Vietnam War, a family who was tragically affected by the war are forced to emigrate to America.

name: The Greatest Movie Ever Sold
tagline: A documentary about branding, advertising and product placement that is financed and made possible by brands, advertising and product placement.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

name: Metropolis
tagline: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.

name: Play the Game
tagline: A young ladies' man teaches his dating tricks to his lonely, widowed grandfather, and plays his best mind games to meet the woman of his dreams.

name: Fugitive Pieces
tagline: A child escapes from Poland during World War II and first heads to Greece before coming of age in Canada.

name: Molière
tagline: Imprisoned for debt, playwright Molière is rescued by an aristocrat who needs his help in order to seduce a young marquise.

name: 2 Days in New York
tagline: Manhattan couple Marion and Mingus, who each have children from prior relationships, find their comfortable family dynamic jostled by a visit from Marion's relatives.

name: Agent Vinod
tagline: A series of seemingly unconnected events across the world leads to Agent Vinod undertaking a globe-trotting mission to discover why his colleague was murdered.

name: We Are Family

production.name: Films & Casting Temple Pvt. Ltd. Sydney

tagline: Diagnosed with cancer, a mother decides to find a step-mom for her 3 children.

name: Forever Strong
tagline: A rugby player is put up in a juvenile detention center. There he plays for the Highland Rugby team and ultimately plays against his father in the National Championships.

name: Beaumarchais the Scoundrel
tagline: The life story of the titular Beaumarchais (Fabrice Luchini), playwright and adventurer, who gets himself into numerous different scrapes and romantic encounters in 18th Century France.

name: Red Cliff
tagline: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

name: Deadly Illusion
tagline: A detective is framed for a murder he didn't commit.

name: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
tagline: In order to support her ten children, Evelyn Ryan (Moore) enters a commercial jingle-writing contest. Based on a true story.

production.name: Instituto Nacional de Cine y Artes Audiovisuales (INCAA)

name: A Secret
tagline: A 15-year-old boy unearths a shocking family secret.

name: Texas Rangers
tagline: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the dangerous, ruthless duty of cleaning up the West.

name: Amreeka
tagline: A drama centered on the trials and tribulations of a proud Palestinian Christian immigrant single mother and her teenage son in small town Indiana.

name: Cronos

production.name: Fondo de Fomento a la Calidad Cinematográfica

tagline: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

name: My First Mister
tagline: A 17-year-old girl has a troubled relationship with a 49-year-old man.

name: Ajami
tagline: Ajami is the religiously mixed community of Muslims and Christians in Tel Aviv. These are five stories about the everyday life in Ajami.

name: The Passenger
tagline: A frustrated war correspondent, unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, takes the risky path of co-opting the I.D. of a dead arms dealer acquaintance.

name: Trembling Before G-d
tagline: A cinematic portrait of various gay Orthodox Jews who struggle to reconcile their faith and their sexual orientation.

name: Agora
tagline: A historical drama set in Roman Egypt, concerning a slave who turns to the rising tide of Christianity in the hopes of pursuing freedom while also falling in love with his master, the famous female philosophy and mathematics professor Hypatia of Alexandria.

name: The House of Yes
tagline: A mentally unbalanced young woman (who thinks she's Jackie Kennedy) flips into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he's engaged.

name: Howl
tagline: As Allen Ginsberg talks about his life and art, his most famous poem is illustrated in animation while the obscenity trial of the work is dramatized.

name: I Served the King of England
tagline: A look at the glamorous life at an old-world Prague hotel.

name: Trekkies
tagline: A film about the fans of the various versions of "Star Trek".

name: Stonewall
tagline: A group of homosexual people try to live with dignity and self-respect while events build to the opening battle in the major gay rights movement.

name: Vincere
tagline: The story of Mussolini's secret lover, Ida Dalser, and their son Albino.

name: Guinevere
tagline: A young girl from an affluent family rebels and becomes involved with a much older photographer.

name: Going Upriver: The Long War of John Kerry
tagline: A documentary on Senator John Kerry's Navy tour of duty in Vietnam, his contributions to the peace movement that followed, and the ultimate shape of his future political career.

name: The Wizard of Oz
tagline: Animated version of the classic story of a young farmgirl who is transported to the magic land of Oz.

name: Le Havre
tagline: When an African boy arrives by cargo ship in the port city of Le Havre, an aging shoe shiner takes pity on the child and welcomes him into his home.

name: Fiza
tagline: In 1993 Fiza's brother disappears during the riots in Mumbai. In 1999 Fiza is tired of waiting and goes looking for him.

name: The Hunt
tagline: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer
tagline: Based on the true life serial killer, Henry Lee Lucas.

name: Gunner Palace
tagline: American soldiers of the 2/3 Field Artillery, a group known as the "Gunners," tell of their experiences in Baghdad during the Iraq War. Holed up in a bombed out pleasure palace built by Sadaam Hussein, the soldiers endured hostile situations some four months after President George W. Bush declared the end of major combat operations in the country.

name: Not Fade Away
tagline: Set in suburban New Jersey the 1960s, a group of friends form a rock band and try to make it big.

name: The Filth and the Fury
tagline: A film about the career of the notorious punk rock band, the Sex Pistols.

name: Everlasting Moments
tagline: In a time of social change and unrest, war and poverty, a young working class woman, Maria, wins a camera in a lottery. The decision to keep it alters her whole life.

name: Da
tagline: A New York playwright is summoned to Ireland to bury his father (his "Da"). While at his boyhood home, he encounters his father's spirit and relives memories both pleasant and not.

name: Mean Creek
tagline: When a teen is bullied, his brother and friends lure the bully into the woods to seek vengeance.

name: Wild West Comedy Show: 30 Days & 30 Nights - Hollywood to the Heartland
tagline: In this documentary, the show's emcee, Vince Vaughn, and four stand-up comedians hand-picked by Vaughn, travel the country and perform in 30 cities. This film documents the interactions on and off stage along the way.

name: Knights of the City
tagline: A street gang that is also a rap group tries to get a record contract.

name: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
tagline: Two best friends being convinced that they are not in love search for each other's love.

name: Chungking Express
tagline: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

name: Together
tagline: A violin prodigy and his father travel to Beijing, where the father seeks the means to his son's success while the son struggles to accept the path laid before him.

name: Swept Away
tagline: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

name: The Third Man
tagline: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, black-market opportunist Harry Lime.

name: Blue Like Jazz
tagline: Don, a nineteen-year-old sophomore at a Texas junior college, tries to escape his Bible Belt upbringing for life in the Pacific Northwest at the most godless campus in America.

name: Schultze Gets the Blues
tagline: Schultze is an accordion player and newly without work. When the local music club celebrates its 50th anniversary, his taste of music changes unexpectedly.

name: Heroine
tagline: A female superstar struggles through the trials and tribulations of being a Bollywood actress.

name: Two Much
tagline: A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.
